Side Leg Kicks Arm Position

Strength is where it's at!

@GavinCurnow @whatchidid definitely tip the entire cabinet back to get those bowls upright. Then make sure when you rest that you have the front of the cabinet legs/base slightly uplifted with a shim as maybe your floor is not level.

Control: Can you stop on a dime at any point in any exercise...even in fast and hard moments?  
Modify until you can stop in any position. 
Contrology is the study, the art, the science of control. Couldn't it apply to any exercise in Pilates?
#TuesdayTip #WhatWouldShariSay #wwss https://t.co/SQUNNTHM5R

Stand up for yourself. 
Know what you are about and who you are.

That's on you. Stand up for yourself.
